name: Project - Re:Verb
description:
Explore the mysteries in store backstage as DiCENTRA prepares to debut! This companion piece follows the music video release of DiCENTRA's Prologue allowing you to perform along with the DiCENTRA team and unlock some hidden lore and content while you're at it. Be sure to share your high scores with us on social media using #dicentraprojectreverb!

Credit:

Game Development - Tiger "Haoran" Shi [@TaimeToFly]
